4 â—¾ Session Manager Made Simple:
Tab Cleaner doubles as a browser session manager, letting you save and manage multiple sessions effortlessly. Perfect for researchers, students, and professionals juggling multiple projects.
5 â—¾ Save Chrome Tabs for Later:
Whether youâ€™re working, shopping, or exploring, you can save all tabs and come back to them anytime without worrying about losing your progress.

â“ Who is Tab Cleaner for?
Whether youâ€™re a student juggling coursework, a professional working on multiple projects, or just someone who wants a faster, more organized browser, Tab Cleaner is for you. With its quick tab saver functionality, you can easily save all tab URLs and focus on what matters most.

âš™ï¸ How Tab Cleaner Works
1 - Click the Tab Cleaner icon to save all open tabs into one organized session.
2 - Instantly close all saved tabs to free up memory and CPU resources.
3 - Access and restore saved tabs individually or all at once with a simple click.
4 - Enjoy faster browsing with fewer resources being consumed by idle tabs.

â€¢ PiÃ¹ potente di Tab Session Manager: Sebbene Tab Session Manager offra molte funzionalitÃ , Tab Cleaner si concentra sulla semplicitÃ  senza sacrificare le prestazioni.
